content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
No new structures have been successfully established on the map during these steps. Repeated attempts were made to create and place a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs, but all such actions failed due to inventory and crafting shortages. Although the agent interacted with two furnaces – an iron furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0) and a copper furnace at Position(–27.0, –60.0) used for smelting operations – these were not built by the agent and remain part of the existing map assets.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Usage for get_entities:
  – Avoid passing unsupported parameters. The errors “got an unexpected keyword argument 'radius'” and “takes 0 positional arguments but 3 were given” indicate that the function was called with an incorrect signature. Verify and adhere to the defined API parameters.

• Lab Placement Failures:
  – The attempts to place a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) failed due to a lack of lab items in inventory. Confirm that the required lab item is available before attempting placement.

• Lab Crafting Resource Shortages:
  – Multiple lab crafting errors are due to insufficient intermediate ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheel, electronic-circuit, and copper-cable) caused by gaps in the production chain. Ensure that all prerequisite resources and production processes (like smelting and intermediate crafting) are operational and sufficiently stocked before initiating lab crafting.

• Handling NoneType in Entity Retrieval:
  – An error occurred when iterating over a None value (e.g. “NoneType object is not iterable”). Implement checks or fallback logic (for example, converting a None result to an empty list) when retrieving entities to avoid such type errors.
